title: Pixel 6 Pro gets a fun ‘Panda’ repair job — what’s your favorite customized Pixel look?
content:
Colors have also been a key part of Google’s Pixel lineup, from the stunning “Really Blue” original Pixel to the delightful “Sorta Seafoam” and “Kinda Coral” on this year’s Pixel 6. But the colors Google provides really only scratch the surface. Now, a “Panda” repair job to a Pixel 6 Pro has us thinking, what’s the best way to improve the look of the Pixel?

more…

The post Pixel 6 Pro gets a fun ‘Panda’ repair job — what’s your favorite customized Pixel look? appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google's Pixel 6 Pro just got a fun "Panda" repair job, and it's got us thinking about how far you can go in customizing the phone's look.
